title: Contest Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is logged into the App
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Menu
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the menu item, Contests, with the respective icon, a trophy. 

For iOS: Please check on Retina and Non Retina

title: Menu > Contests badge (iOS only)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS App installed
AND is logged into the app
AND the contest is open
AND the user has not entered the contest by making picks
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Menu
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a badge notification next to Contests
AND it will be displayed as a numeric value laid on top of a colored circle, depending on the sponsorship it will be colored accordingly. (2016 is Domino's sponsored).

title: Contests Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has downloaded Beat the Streak app
AND has entered the app
AND the user has selected the menu button
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Contests
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be taken to the Contest index page
AND user will see separate sections for Open Contests and Closed Contests

title: Contests Page > Open Section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed the BTS App
AND the user is logged into the App
AND the user taps on Menu and Contests
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the Open Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a line item for each Open Contest
AND the user will see the title of each Open Contest
AND the user will see the description of the contest that describes how the contest will work on one line.
AND the user will see the prize for winning the contest
AND the user will see when the contest locks
AND the user will see an information icon which will direct users to the rules of the contest.

title: Contests Page > Final Section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed the BTS App
AND the user is in the App
AND the user taps on Menu and Contests
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls to the Final Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a line item for each Closed Contest
AND the user will see the title of each Closed Contest
AND the user will see the description of the contest that describes how the contest will work on one line.
AND the user will see the prize for winning the contest
AND the user will see when the contest locks
AND the user will see an information icon which will direct users to the rules of the contest.

title: Contest Selection (No Picks)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND the user is logged in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the menu
AND then taps on Contests
AND then taps on an open contest from the Open Contest section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Contest title
AND the user will see Quick Pick option
AND a line item for each required selection
AND a plus sign (+) next to each line item

title: Contest Selection (Picks)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Beat the Streak App
AND the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Open Contents
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on an open contest from the Open Contest section
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Contest title
AND the user will see Quick Pick option
AND a header with Pick # and Player
AND line item for each player
AND will display player's name, to be displayed prominently
AND subtitle line for the player, describing his opponent and opposing pitcher ERA, it will be blank if the pitcher has not been announced.
AND player's headshot, to be displayed prominently next to the player's name
AND a red circle with white minus to remove the player

title: Make a Pick Screen > Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Beat the Streak App
AND the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Open Contents
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on plus (+) sign to selection a player
custom_expected:
THEN the user is a brought to a Make a Pick screen with a list of all teams to help the user navigate to desired player(s)
AND a Back button to bring you back to the player selection screen for that contest
AND team logo and team name
AND subtitle line with the team matchup
AND subtitle line with opposing pitcher and Hits per 9 statistic, it is blank if the pitcher has not been announced.

title: Make a Pick Screen > Team > Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Beat the Streak App
AND the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Open Contents
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on plus (+) sign to selection a player
AND the user user taps on a team
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the player page for that team
AND it will have the team name on top
AND a line item for each player with headshot, player name, and stats (AVG and opponent)
AND a plus sign next to each player 
OR a minus sign if already selected for that contest
AND a Done button on the top right that directs the user back to the contest submission screen.

title: Make a Pick Screen > Team > Player: Too Many Picks Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND has selected an Open contest that he already made selections
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on an open selection
AND then taps on a team
AND taps on different players from that team so that the total numbers of selections exceeds the overall maximum for the contest
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an error dialog should appear stating:
"Please remove a pick if you want to add another."

title: Contests - Submit button (all picks not complete)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is logged in with an active account
AND is in an Open Contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has used Quick Pick to complete the contest
AND removed a few picks
OR the user has made manual selections but not completed the pick
custom_expected: THEN at the top right of the page, the Submit Picks button will not be active

title: Contest - Submit Button (all picks complete)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is logged in with an active account
AND is in an Open Contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has used Quick Pick to complete the contest
OR the user has manually made selections to complete the contest
OR a combination of both
custom_expected:
THEN at the top right of the page, the Submit button will be active and tappable.
AND the user will see a spinning loading logo.

title: Contest - Make a Pick (not locked, not picked)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is in the App
AND the user is in an open contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the contest is not locked
AND the user has not submitted a pick
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a plus sign (+) option

title: Contest - Make a Pick (not locked, picked)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is in the App
AND the user is in an open contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the contest is not locked
AND the user has submitted a pick
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a red circle with white minus to remove the selection
AND then the user will see a plus sign to add a new selection

title: Contest - Make a Pick (locked)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is in the App
AND the user is in an open contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the contest is locked
AND the user has submitted a pick
OR the user has not submitted a pick
custom_expected: THEN the client should not supply pick editing or pick making GUI options

title: Quick Pick screen
custom_preconds:
WHEN the user has BTS  installed
AND is logged in with an account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the menu
AND taps on Contest
AND taps on an contest in the Open Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the user taps on Quick Pick button
AND the user will see instructions explaining Quick Pick
AND the user will see filters related to the contest
AND the user can select a filter
AND the user will see instructions informing them that they can alway change picks before the contest locks

title: Quick Pick (Partial picks)
custom_preconds:
WHEN the user has BTS App installed
AND is logged in with an account
AND the user has already made partial selections towards the completion of the contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Quick Pick button
AND the user selects one of the filters: Top Batting Averages, Top Hit Totals, Top % Games with a Hit (vary per Contest)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be returned to the Contest page
AND the Quick Pick will have selected the remaining picks

title: Quick Pick (All picks)
custom_preconds:
WHEN the user has BTS App installed
AND is logged in with an account
AND the user has already not made selections towards the completion of the contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Quick Pick button
AND the user selects one of the filters: Top Batting Averages, Top Hit Totals, Top % Games with a Hit (vary per Contest)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be returned to the Contest page
AND the Quick Pick will have selected all of the picks

title: Quick Pick (Edit picks)
custom_preconds:
WHEN the user has BTS App installed
AND is logged in with an account
AND the user has already made partial selections towards the completion of the contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Quick Pick button
AND the user selects one of the Quick Pick filters.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be returned to the Contest page
AND the Quick Pick will have selected the remaining picks
AND the user can edit the picks made by Quick Pick by tapping on the red minus sign.

title: Contest Scored - Status Indicator - Pending
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Contests
AND the user taps on a Closed Contest from the Closed Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the contest results will open
AND player in the line item has no result, then it will have no status indicator

title: Contest Scored - Status Indicator - Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Contests
AND the user taps on a Closed Contest from the Closed Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the contest results will open
AND player in the line item has success, then it will have status indicator of green

title: Contest Scored - Status Indicator - Failed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Contests
AND the user taps on a Closed Contest from the Closed Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the contest results will open
AND player in the line item has fail, then it will have status indicator of red

title: Contest State - Open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
and is in the App
and is on the Contest page
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest with a contest_state of Open
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the contest in Open Contests section
AND the contest is open and ready for user picks

title: Contest State - Locked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
and is in the App
and is on the Contest page
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest with a contest_state of  Locked
custom_expected:
THEN user will not be able to submit picks
AND the contest is locked, and there are no entries in the leaderboard

title: Contest State - Scored
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
and is in the App
and is on the Contest page
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest with a contest_state of Locked
custom_expected:
THEN user will not be able to submit picks
AND the contest is locked, and there is at least one entry in the leaderboard
AND the user making the call is not necessarily ranked in this state
AND the score will be displayed at the top left

title: Contest State - Final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
and is in the App
and is on the Contest page
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest with a contest_state of Final
custom_expected:
THEN user will not be able to make picks
AND the contest is locked and the leaderboard is final
AND there will be no further changes to the contest
AND the user making the call is not necessarily ranked in this state

title: Contest Leaderboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Menu
AND the user taps on Contests
AND the user taps on a line item (indicated with an circled i) for a contest from the Final Contests section
custom_expected:
THEN the leaderboard for that contests (i.e. BTS in a Day Leaders) will display two tables with the identical number of columns with two default columns (rank and user information)
AND the user will see a user score table with the following: Rank, Your Name (with avatar), and stats from the contests
AND the user will see a space
AND the user will see a high scores table in ascending order with the following: Rank, Leaders, stats from the contests

title: Contest - Closed (No User Picks)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into BTS
AND has not made any picks to a contest during the time it was open
AND not the contest is closed and final
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a contest in the Final Contests section of the Contest index page
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the following message (in line of where normal picks would be)
AND it reads "You did not submit any picks for this Contest before lock time. See how others did by tapping “Leaderboard” above."
AND the Leaderboard link will be tap-able

title: Contest Creation (by Product)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND Product has created a new Contest
custom_steps:
WHEN the Contest is created and published
AND is made available
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see an updated badge number next to Contests in the menu
AND the user will be able to open the contests

title: Contest Creation - Status: Restricted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND is logged into the App
AND is on the Contest Page (Menu > Contest)
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest that is in generating_status of Restricted
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not see the contest on the Contest Page
AND the contest is restricted exclusively to administrative users who have been added to the fntsy_admin table

title: Contest Creation - Status: Ready
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND is logged into the App
AND is on the Contest Page (Menu > Contest)
custom_steps: WHEN Product creates a contest that is in generating_status of Ready
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the contest on the Contest Page
AND the contest is open to the public

title: Doubleheader
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND is attempting to select players for a contest
custom_steps: WHEN a doubleheader is on the current MLB schedule
custom_expected: THEN only players in the first game of the doubleheader will be eligible for selection. Game 2 should not be shown

title: Suspended Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND is attempting to select players for a contest
custom_steps: WHEN their is a suspended game on the MLB schedule
custom_expected: THEN any player results up until the point of suspension for that day/night game should be recorded and scored. If the game is resumed after 6am the following morning, no additional points would count for that days game.

title: Change Password on Wired (iOS App)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS App installed
AND has logged in into the App without logging out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes their BAM password on the wired site
AND then attempts to make a pick on the BTS App
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be logged out
AND receive a "Session Expired. We apologize for logging you out, but your session has expired. Please login again to continue playing Beat the Streak!" message.
AND the user can login with the new password and make a pick successfully

title: Change Password on Wired (Android App)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS App installed
AND has logged in previously and remained logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes the BAM password on the wired site
AND attempts to submit a pick on the Android App
custom_expected:
THEN they will not be logged out
AND receive a “You are not logged in. Please sign in again.” message
AND the user will need to go to Settings > Sign Out
AND can sign back in with the new BAM password

title: Attempting to add same player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS App installed
AND the user is logged into the App
AND the user has already selected a player for an open contest (i.e. Mike Trout)
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to pick the same player for that contest
custom_expected: THEN the player is not available for the user to pick (no plus sign)

title: Edit a pick (before lock time)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is in the App
AND the user has completed a Contest
AND the lock period has not passed
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to edit a pick
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to edit a pick and new pick will be reflected once the Contest update is submitted

title: Edit a pick (after lock time)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is in the App
AND the user has completed a Contest
AND the lock period has passed
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to edit a pick
custom_expected: THEN none of the field is editable.

title: Submit BTS Traditional Pick and BTS Contest Pick
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND the user is logged into the App
AND the user already submitted a BTS contest pick
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to submit to the traditional BTS game
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to submit a pick for the BTS traditional game and BTS contest game

title: Contest Branding
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the BTS App installed
AND is in the App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Menu
AND taps on Contests
custom_expected:
THEN the contest pages will have the consistent branding from the sponsor
AND the menu header is updated to reflect sponsor's branding and Beat the Streak

title: Postponed - BTS in a Day Contest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND has already selected players for a contest
AND the Lock Time has past
custom_steps: WHEN their is a postponed game on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
THEN for the BTS in a Day Contest, the player affected by postponed game will not record a hit
AND the player would be deemed as a failed pick

title: Postponed - Pick a No Hitter Contest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND has already selected players for a contest
AND the Lock Time has past
custom_steps: WHEN their is a postponed game on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
THEN for the Pick a no hitter, the player affected by postponed game will have no official at bat
AND since no ABs then it will not count toward the minimum AB requirement

title: Postponed - 7 for 57 Contest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND has already selected players for a contest
AND the Lock Time has past
custom_steps: WHEN their is a postponed game on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
THEN for the 7 for 57 Contest, then their will be no official AB for that player
AND no increase in hit totel

title: Postponed - Pick .406 Contest
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has BTS installed
AND is logged in with an active account
AND has already selected players for a contest
AND the Lock Time has past
custom_steps: WHEN their is a postponed game on the MLB schedule
custom_expected:
THEN for the Pick .406 Contest, then their will be no official AB for that player
AND contribute nothing to the AB requirement

title: Leaderboard- .406 Batting Average
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user has Beat The Streak
AND has logged in
AND has gone through the on boarding process
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Leaderboard Page
AND the user taps on the name of the leaderboard
AND the user selects .406 Contest (Since 7/20)
custom_expected:
THEN The user should see the .406 Contest Leaderboard
AND their Streak average should display
AND the Top Streak's should display.
